authenticatorAppTitle: Enable two-factor authentication via Authenticator App
downloadApp: First, download the Authenticator App onto your device
scanQrCode: Then, use the Authenticator App to scan this QR code
enterCodeInstructions: Or enter this code into your Authenticator App
disableMessage: By disabling two-factor authentication your account will be less secure. Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication on your account?
enterCodeSmsLabel: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to {{phoneNumber}} to finish setting up two-factor authentication.
enterCodeAuthenticatorLabel: Please enter the confirmation code you see on your authentication app.
enabledMessage: We'll ask for a code if we notice an attempted login from an unrecognized device or browser
choosePhone: Select your phone numberChoose a mobile phone number already on your account or add a new phone number for two-factor authentication. This is the number you will receive your verification code on.
phoneNumberInformation1: This phone number will be enabled for two-factor authentication and login. We may also use the number added here to help protect our community, accurately count people who use our services, and assist you in accessing Expert Session and opt-in programs, but not for purposes such as suggesting friends or providing ads. Only you will see this number on your profile.
phoneNumberInformation2: If the number added here is provided elsewhere across Expert Session Products, it may be used for other purposes including suggesting friends or providing ads.
